title: Karuppan
occurrences: They are boasting a lot. Where is Karuppan?

Karuppan is coming.
Karuppan has descended. He is talented in this.
Karuppan has won.
Karuppan wins the gold medal.

Who, Karuppan?
Call Karuppan.
Karuppan is recently married.
